attributes.action: Halt the pay out of bonuses to Northern Rock Staff announced on 21st Jan 09
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Halt the pay out of bonuses to Northern Rock Staff announced on 21st Jan 09.  Investigate the matter and pay bonuses in line with other public sector workers, if at all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
